# Programando con `R base`

```{r}

df <- tibble::tibble(
 a = rnorm(10),
 b = rnorm(10),
 c = rnorm(10),
 d = rnorm(10)
)


df
```

---

# Programando con `R base`


```{r}

df$a <- (df$a - min(df$a)) /
 (max(df$a) - min(df$a))

df$b <- (df$b - min(df$b)) /
 (max(df$b) - min(df$a))

df$c <- (df$c - min(df$c)) /
 (max(df$c) - min(df$c))

df$d <- (df$d - min(df$d)) /
 (max(df$d) - min(df$d))
```

# Progrmando con `R base` 

```{r}

x <- df$a

(x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))
```

--

```{r}

rng <- range(x)

(x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
```

--

```{r}

rescale01 <- function(x) {
 rng <- range(x, na.rm = TRUE)
 (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
}


rescale01(c(22, 50, 10, 32))
```

## `function()` 
### generalizar cálculo de % para un vector


```{r}

calcular_pct <- function(data){
  
  round(data/sum(data)*100,1) #<<
  
}
```

# Iteración 
## Ejemplo: guardar múltiples archivos



```{r, eval=F}

# CORRER EN VERSION LOCAL / para evitar guardado 

data <- geo %>% 
  group_by(name_prov) %>%
  nest() 



dir.create("geo_arg")

data %>% 
  mutate(salida = walk2(.x = data, .y = name_prov,
                     ~ st_write(obj = .x, 
                                dsn = glue::glue("geo_arg/{.y}.shp")))) 



```
